duck: Salience (neuroscience), the state or quality of an item that stands out relative to neighboring items
Salience (language), relative importance or prominence of a piece of a sign (semiotics and communication)
salience definition: the quality or state of being salient.

wiki.text:
'Salience' or 'saliency' may refer to:

* Salience (neuroscience), the state or quality of an item that stands out
  relative to neighboring items
* Salience (language), relative importance or prominence of a piece of a sign
  (semiotics and communication)
* Salience, a term used in CLIPS (an expert systems programming language)
wiki.title: salience
